section.title: JBoss Developer Studio Eclipse Versions
section.para: JBoss Developer Studio (JBDS) 3.0x is based on Eclipse 3.5, while JBDS 4.0 is based on Eclipse 3.6. This prevents a direct upgrade from JBDS 3.0x to 4.0.

Workspaces created with JBDS 3.0x can generally be opened in JBDS 4.0, however this is not guaranteed be the case. Always backup your existing workspaces (see for more information) before attempting to use them with JBDS 4.0.

note.title: Tip
note.para: The JBDS executable has changed in JBDS 4.0 from eclipse to jbdevstudio.

section.title: Back Up Existing Workspaces
section.para: It is recommended that existing workspaces created with JBDS 3.0x are backed up before attempting use them with JBDS 4.0. This can be done by copying the workspace directory to a backup location, or compressing it as an archive.
To find the location of your workspace directory select File Switch Workspace. The resulting list will show you the location of previously used workspaces.
